DBD is a great game, the Devs have a clear passion for horror and license IP's that they obtain. This is a great game to get friends to play. My problem with this game is the early grind, before you actually get to play competitively you need to unlock all survivors or wait for the perks in the shrine, or spend a million blood points to get the perks you want on the character you want to play, god forbid you wanna play other characters. You then also have to spend an extra 100$ on dlc characters to unlock them. It is a lot of work to get the "good" perks, that being said if you put in the work this game is very rewarding

Terrible, hit detection is a mile away the time it takes to find a match is horrifically long. The killers are toxic and you can't even report them for toxic characteristics because the developers basically said get over it. Waste of time and money.

I've got an error after the end of every match that makes me lose progress making the game unprogressable and unplayable. Alredy contacted support but I've read some formus that date this error back to almost a yaer back... Regret a lot spending money on the DLCs and then this starts happening...

The game itself is stupid, bugs littered everywhere, and stupid tactics used by both killer and survivors. The developers also barely listen to their fan base. The only thing that drives this review forward is its addicting factors. The game is super addicting and when you get a good lobby with no toxic teammates the game can be fantastic. Other times, (Most of the time) you will be stuck with overly immersed survivors and killers who will face camp, slug, bait you. (I get these are valid tactics but they are super annoying to go up against.) (Why cant the devs make it so when you get to half health when slugged you can choose to let go kinda like what you can do on hook.) THIS GAME IS VERY TOXIC but also very addicting

This game is absolutely amazing despite its flaws. It has been hard to convince myself to sleep instead of playing dbd. I highly recommend this game, it can be frustrating at times but no online game isn't.  Buy this game. If you have friends to survive with, buy it. If you want to play alone, buy this game. Point it, Steam has a 2 hours played refund policy. Buy this game, try it out alone or with friends, you'll love it.

:D

Jogo excelente! Eu era muito viciado em Fortnite, deixava de jogar vários jogos pra jogar o Fortnite, tinha CSGO, R6, GTA, enfim... mas agora que tenho o Dead By Daylight só jogo ele kkkk apesar de passar raiva ás vezes, jogando como killer.
É um jogo muito divertido, que com certeza vc vai passar horas jogando, seja com seus amigos ou sozinho. Além disso, acha as partidas bem rapidamente (Isso no PC).
Ótimo jogo para fãs de filmes e franquias de terror/suspense como Halloween, hora do pesadelo, Massacre da serra elétrica, Scream, etc. Além de contar com muitos killers e parcerias, há também muitos sobreviventes e perks legais para combinar e se divertir bastante.  

Se fosse pra citar pontos negativos, seria: Alguns bugs que acontecem de vez em quando, o preço das skins, que são caras (skins, mas personagens são só uns 10 a 15 reais) e o balanceamento dos ranks nas partidas. Porém, tanto o game quanto os personagens estão sempre ficando em promoção. Recomendo, compre e n irá se arrepender!
